density.note: Dynamic: use expansion coefficient to calculate density at other T

latentHeatOfVaporization.note: Energy required to boil water to steam at 100°C

compressibility.note: How much density changes under pressure (use for high-altitude inverse)

antoineCoefficients.note: Predicts vapor pressure of liquid water (used for boiling at altitude)

electricalConductivity.note: Pure water is a poor conductor
electricalConductivity.applicationUse: Shows baseline; any dissolved ions dramatically increase conductivity
